topic_title: Amazon Elastic Block Store Block Device Property

variables.name: Iops
variables.required:
Conditional Required when the volume type is
                     io1; not used with other volume types.

variables.name: SnapshotId
variables.required:
Conditional If you specify both SnapshotId and
                     VolumeSize, VolumeSize must be equal or greater than
                  the size of the snapshot.

variables.name: VolumeSize
variables.required:
Conditional If you specify both SnapshotId and
                     VolumeSize, VolumeSize must be equal or greater than
                  the size of the snapshot.
